ai_description: A roll of pink and white cleaning cloths with a distinctive wavy, zigzag pattern. The product is packaged as a convenient roll-type system with clear branding showing 'OKS' on the label. The cloths feature a textured non-woven fabric surface that appears ideal for effective cleaning. The roll contains 30 individual cloths measuring 35cm x 25cm each. Lifestyle images show the cloth being used for wiping surfaces and held over a bathroom sink, demonstrating its practical cleaning applications.
